<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update the Active flag of the Workspace Record Type Selectors to the default value of true</description>
        <name>Set Workspace Type selectors active</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.agent_workspace.itsm')) {
	var typesGR = new GlideRecord('aw_record_type_selector');
	typesGR.addNullQuery('active');
	typesGR.query();

	typesGR.setWorkflow(false);
	while (typesGR.next()) {
		typesGR.setValue('active', true);
		typesGR.update();
	}
}]]></script>
